page.title: 13MANOR GARAGE,PARISH CLUB
page.content: The Manor Garage was rebuilt in 1982 because of a fire in the building.Mr Williamson is self employed and he has one helper Barry.there is a safe which they need by law for the M.O.T papers.They have a transformer that transforms 240 volts into 2000 volts.They have about Â£5000 worth of tools alone.Mr Williamson is 23 years old. PARISH CLUB Mr. Chambers has been a club steward for three years, he has 12-15 staff working at different times. To use the club you need a membership card or a C.I.U. card which can get you into any club in England. The membership cards cost 60p and last for a year C.I.U cards cost Â£1.20.The opening hours are from 12 noon to 3p.m. and 7p.m. to 11 p.m..Tetley and Webster serve the club its beer.
